shared.description: Whether the library should be shared across all domains.

domain.description: Domain name, if the library belongs to a certain domain.

additionalPrefix.description: Additional custom prefix for selectors and class names

directory.description: Subpath of the library beneath the domain or shared folder.

importPath.description: For publishable libs: Official package name used in import statements

type.description: A type to determine if and how to build the library.

simpleName.description: Don't include the directory in the name of the module or standalone component entry of the library.

style.description: The file extension or preprocessor to use for style files
